description: Create a job production plan summary.

flags.name: --start-on
flags.validation: Must be a date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

flags.name: --end-on
flags.validation: Must be a date in YYYY-MM-DD format and on or after --start-on.

flags.description: Group by attributes (comma-separated). Defaults to customer unless set.
flags.name: --group-by
flags.validation: Comma-separated list; values must be whitelisted group-by attributes.

flags.default: plan_count,tons_sum,truck_hours_sum,cycle_count_sum (when no metrics flags and --all-metrics is false)
flags.name: --metrics

flags.description: Include all metrics returned by the API
flags.name: --all-metrics
--filters
flags.validation: Must be a valid JSON object.

flags.name: --filter
flags.validation: Each entry must be key=value with a non-empty key.

permissions: Authenticated user (persisted account) required to create job production plan summaries.
validation_notes: --start-on and --end-on are required; dates are parsed as YYYY-MM-DD and end-on must be on or after start-on. group-by may include only whitelisted attributes (see help list) and cannot be empty when set. If group-by includes "after", after_date must be provided in the API attributes. --filters must be a valid JSON object; each --filter entry must be key=value with a non-empty key. Available filters include broker, business_unit, contractor, customer, date, job_name_or_number_like, job_number, material_type_ultimate_parent_qualified_names, material_type_ultimate_parent_count, planner, project, project_manager, status, timely_scheduled, and all group-by attributes; metric min/max filters like goal_tons_min/goal_tons_max, production_hours_min/production_hours_max, tons_min/tons_max, truck_hours_min/truck_hours_max are supported.
